thread.title_full: Social Media Sensation Burrnationk9s Inspires The Animal Community With Their Viral Content Creation Of Their Dogs – The US Times

author: Editor
title: Social Media Sensation Burrnationk9s Inspires The Animal Community With Their Viral Content Creation Of Their Dogs – The US Times
text:
Today we’d like to introduce you to Burrnationk9s.
It’s an honor to speak with you today. Why don’t you give us some details about you and your story. How did you get to where you are today?
Burrnationk9s is a dog breeding company specializing in XL Pitbull & XL American Bully. Founded by Alandise Harris.
Our History:
Burrnationk9s was founded in Jan 1st 2015 by Alandise Harris, with the aim of offering its customers the best structured XL American Bullies and Pitbulls.
Key People at Burrnationk9s:
Alandise Harris is the founder and current CEO of Burrnationk9s. He’s a former Arkansas Razorback and currently a professional basketball player overseas.
Burrnationk9s Customers:
Many megastars like Offset from the rap group Migos, NBA champion Bobby Portis from the Milwaukee Bucks, KJ Jefferson from the Arkansas Razorbacks, to name a few, have their puppies bred and trained by the kennel. You too can become one of Burrnationk9s’ happy customers.
I’m sure your success has not come easily. What challenges have you had to overcome along the way?
Business in itself, ups, downs, and along with battling the stereotype for the pitbulls and American bully breed that we produce.
Social media and animals have been an issue from the start of time alot of people think that animal reproduction should be done and people like peta consistently team of with social media to stop certain types of content even if its not bad.
its a different world dealing with animals and animal lover along with social media. its challenges in where and how you have to post content.
Let’s talk about the work you do. What do you specialize in and why should someone work with you over the competition?
Dog Breeding:
If you’re looking for a reputable company that breeds the finest XL American Bullies and Pitbulls in the world, look no further than Burrnationk9s. Located in Little Rock, Arkansas, Burrnationk9s is a kennel that breeds the finest Bullies and Pitbulls in all colors that no other company can match.
Training Services:
Not only can you expect to be presented with the finest bred dogs, but you can also take advantage of the kennel’s training services.
Burrnationk9s specializes in the following:
– Training dogs for obedience
– Training dogs for dog shows
– Training of dogs for personal protection
– Training of dogs as companion dogs
With the use of positive reinforcement techniques, the kennel will ensure that the high-quality American Bullies and Pitbulls they breed are perfect for your needs.
Mission:
In order to provide you with exceptional pedigrees, the kennel’s goal is to breed litters in which each and every puppy has great build, excellent health, and wonderful temperament. The kennel is passionate about the preservation and improvement of the American Bully and Pitbull breeds, ensuring that every puppy you select meets United Kennel Club and American bully kennel Club standards for health, temperament and physique.
The team at Burrnationk9s has more than 10 years of combined experience working with American XL Bullies and Pitbulls. This experience pays off, which is why the puppies you get from at Burrnationk9s are top notch and are known both nationally and internationally for their excellent breeding and rare color variations.
What’s your best piece of advice for readers who desire to find success in their life?
To find success in breeding and content creation the keys are to
Do your research, know who?, what?, and how? know all competitors in the niche, ask questions and build relationships with people like burrnationk9s to help guide you along your journey. Study The Breeding Programs that most suit you for what you want to do, importantly shop with the best to start your lines, this ensures your bloodlines and relationships with the best programs in breeding.
when it comes to content creation, find the best creators and mirror some of their ideas and make them work for you. you have to study the internet and social media algorithms to be great at this.
You have to give the viewers what they want to see.
most importantly BUILD A BRAND, not just a name but a business. meaning llc, licensing, trade marks, credit, and huge marketing strategies. These few tips will ensure that you be amongst the best if done right.
Speaking of success, what does the word mean to you?
success is in the eye of the beholder. I would say setting your goals and achieving them is success, we take success in portions one plan at a time do it then move on to the next its a never ending loop when it comes to achieving growth and success.
What’s next for you?
Burrnationk9s plans to keep creating amazing content going into 2023, keep producing the best american bullies and pitbulls, plans to move the company to over 100 plus acres of land with a lake and build one of the best dog facilities in the world.
Looking to be verified on all social media accounts in 2023 Burrnationk9s is currently verified on Facebook, YouTube, google my business, onlyfans and have a verified Google Knowledge Panel.
Finally, how can people connect with you if they want to learn more?
